nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES IN EFFECT...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCHES IN EFFECT... As of 9:00 AM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Seventeen-E was located near 16.2, -100.8 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Seventeen-E (EP2/EP172025)
